meanings.sent1: The multipiston in the engine helps it run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic explained how the multipiston works in the car.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if a multipiston could be used in a toy car to make it faster.
meanings.sent4: Her brain felt like a multipiston firing on all cylinders during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The multipiston hummed as it powered the machine with its many pistons.

meanings.sent1: The multipiston engine was more powerful than the single-piston one.
meanings.sent2: He admired the multipiston design of the new motorcycle.
meanings.sent3: The multipiston toaster could toast bread twice as fast!
meanings.sent4: His mind was a multipiston machine, processing information rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The multipiston car roared down the highway, leaving others behind.
